wikipedia_page.main: Patricia J. Beckford (born 6 August 1965) is an English former sprinter. She represented Great Britain in the women's 400 metres at the 1988 Seoul Olympics, and won a bronze medal in the 4 × 400 metres relay at the 1990 European Championships.
